post.text: Our children are watching to see what kind of example we set for them.

comment.author: Christian
comment.text: I took mine with me when I voted for you!

replies.author: Christian
replies.text: Setting a good example of responsibility. I would never vote for a person that degrades women like Trump.

replies.author: Monique
replies.text: And I would never vote for a cheat and a liar like Hillary Clinton.

replies.author: Christian
replies.text: I'll take her over a cheat, liar, and someone that degrades women treating them and talking about them like trash. As a mother I couldn't live with myself.
